title: My dog and I. We write no flights of Dutch or French, no courting of a hansome wench, no monsters, wonders in the air, no persons dying in despair; nor any thing under the sky, but onely of my dog and I. Tune is, My dog and I: or, Bobbing Ione.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, J. Wright, and J. Clarke,
